bug.author: livneros
bug.description:
Hey. We are trying to enable access for our InferenceService only with an IAP authentication. Currently, the access is open through the load balancer's public IP. Is there any solution for that? maybe similar to the <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/components/serving/tfserving_new/#sending-prediction-request-through-ingress-and-iap>tfserving solution</denchmark-link>
Thanks.
